article: a special meeting on security and development in the central african republic -lrb- car -rrb- will take place on may ##-## in new york to mobilize donor assistance in support of the government 's program to restructure the armed forces , and demobilize and reintegrate retired military personnel in the country , u.n. officials announced here wednesday .
